content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? May I have your name to get started?
Yeah, I need someone to fix some electrical stuff. Why do you need my name? Can't you just send someone out?
I understand you want to get help quickly! For our records and to schedule your request, I’ll just need your name. Would you mind sharing it, please?
Fine. It’s Greg. I have a problem with my main breaker and a couple outlets that stopped working. Can you do something about this or is this all automated?
Thank you, Greg! Yes, we can help with electrical panel and outlet issues. May I get the address where service is needed so I can check availability and coverage?
It’s 1199 Four Pines Lane, Ridgelake. I don’t get why you need all this info just to send someone. I’m tired of waiting.
Thanks for providing the address, Greg. I’m sorry, but it looks like your location at 1199 Four Pines Lane, Ridgelake is currently outside of our service area. I apologize for the inconvenience.
Unbelievable. Why didn’t you say that before? I’m tired of these runarounds. This is useless.
reason: Customer location outside service area, customer frustrated and refuses further assistance.
